requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 8800 GT / AMD HD 6850 / Intel HD Graphics 4400 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

results.name: Gun Camera 3D Weapon Simulator AR Game
